translation.en: [man] Hey, tell Marie I'm on my way. I'm headed to the hospital now.
translation.ja: マリーに “今 向かってる”と伝えてくれ

translation.en: And tell her I love her.
translation.ja: "愛している"

translation.en: And everything's gonna be okay.
translation.ja: “心配ない”とも

translation.en: Hey, call me when you get this and let me know what's going on.
translation.ja: 留守電 聞いたら電話してくれ

translation.en: -Marie? -Nah, it's DiAngelo.
translation.ja: マリー？ ディアンジェロだ話せたか？

translation.en: -You talk to her yet? -I can't get through to her.
translation.ja: ディアンジェロだ話せたか？ いや まだ

translation.en: Her cousin Teresa isn't picking up either.
translation.ja: 従姉妹も電話に出ない

translation.en: She's gonna pull through, man. The baby, too.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ　赤ん坊もな

translation.en: Yeah. They will.
translation.ja: そうですよね

translation.en: Hey, look, I gotta go, I gotta try her again. I'll catch up with you later.
translation.ja: 運転中なんで またあとで

translation.en: Yeah, I'll catch you later, man. Call me back when you hear some--
translation.ja: ああ じゃあな 様子が…

translation.en: You okay, Pete?
translation.ja: ピート平気か？

translation.en: What happened?
translation.ja: 何があった？

translation.en: He came out of nowhere.
translation.ja: 突然出てきた

translation.en: [officer] DiAngelo.
translation.ja: ディアンジェロ

translation.en: What condition's he in? Male, female, what?
translation.ja: 怪我は？　男か女か？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.ja: 分からない

translation.en: What the fuck you do, Jablonski?
translation.ja: 何をやらかした？ヤブロンスキー

translation.en: [officer] Who's over there, Di?
translation.ja: どうなってる？

translation.en: Stay on the fucking road.
translation.ja: そっちに行くな

translation.en: Put it in the trunk.
translation.ja: トランクに

translation.en: Di.
translation.ja: ディー！

translation.en: You talk to your wife yet?
translation.ja: カミさんと話したか？

translation.en: How's she doing?
translation.ja: 具合は？

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about?
translation.ja: 何でこんな時に

translation.en: No one saw you, right?
translation.ja: 誰も見てねえよな？

translation.en: Yo, Di!
translation.ja: おい ディー

translation.en: This is what's gonna happen.
translation.ja: 状況は分かった

translation.en: You're gonna leave right now. Go.
translation.ja: ここはもういいから行け

translation.en: -[officer] Di, what the fuck? -Shut up!
translation.ja: 何なんだ？ うるせえ

translation.en: -No, we got to call it in. -He's dead.
translation.ja: 通報しないと 死んでんだ

translation.en: There's nothing you can do for him.
translation.ja: できることはない

translation.en: Did you go over there?
translation.ja: 向こうは行ったか？

translation.en: Did you see what's in that ditch?
translation.ja: 溝の中を見たか？

translation.en: They're gonna crucify you for this.
translation.ja: 責められてひどい目に遭うぞ

translation.en: Every one of us is gonna pay for this. You understand what I'm saying, right?
translation.ja: 俺たち全員がだ 意味がわかるな？

translation.en: No one's gonna find him here, okay?
translation.ja: 死体は見つからない

translation.en: No one's gotta know.
translation.ja: バレやしない

translation.en: Hey. Hey.
translation.ja: なあ おい

translation.en: I said I got this.
translation.ja: 俺に任せろ

translation.en: Get to the hospital. Go be with your wife.
translation.ja: 早く病院に行ってやれ

translation.en: Drive away.
translation.ja: さあ行け

translation.en: [DiAngelo] Get it out of the road.
translation.ja: どかしとけ

translation.en: Where do you want me to put it?
translation.ja: どこに？

translation.en: -[Marie] Yeah. -What are you doing to her?
translation.ja: 何してんだ？

translation.en: Oh, Pete.
translation.ja: ああ ピート

translation.en: It's okay. Don't look so worried. It's just a little spotting.
translation.ja: 大丈夫 心配しないで ただ… ちょっと出血が

translation.en: Did you see Teresa? She was-- She just walked out.
translation.ja: テレサに会った？今出てったのよ

translation.en: Dr. Taranaweh ran an ultrasound. I can pull it up for you if you want.
translation.ja: 超音波の画像をご覧になりますか？

translation.en: No, why don't you get the fucking doctor?
translation.ja: それより医者を呼んでくれ

translation.en: Yeah. Sure.
translation.ja: ああ 分かりました

translation.en: Seriously, Petey?
translation.ja: 何よ その態度

translation.en: That was rude.
translation.ja: 失礼よ

translation.en: No, you said you were bleeding.
translation.ja: 出血してるだって？

translation.en: It stopped.
translation.ja: もう止まった

translation.en: Okay?
translation.ja: 分かった？

translation.en: -You-- -It's fine. I promise.
translation.ja: 本当にもう大丈夫

translation.en: Hey, come here. Come here.
translation.ja: こっちに来て 来てってば

translation.en: We're past the five month mark, Pete.
translation.ja: ５か月過ぎたのよ

translation.en: I have a good feeling, you know?
translation.ja: 順調に行くわ

translation.en: Yeah, I know. No, it's just...
translation.ja: 分かってる　ただ…

translation.en: -You just scared me there. -I know. I know.
translation.ja: 心配なんだ もう平気 安心して

translation.en: What happened?
translation.ja: どうしたの？

translation.en: It was nothing. No, we just...
translation.ja: いや 別に さっきまで

translation.en: -We were working. -[nurse] Doc will be here in a minute.
translation.ja: 仕事してた 先生がすぐに

translation.en: [nurse] It'll turn itself off.
translation.ja: 自動で切れますので

translation.en: Babe.
translation.ja: 赤ちゃん

translation.en: There he is.
translation.ja: ほら見て

translation.en: Little Poke.
translation.ja: うちのチビちゃん

translation.en: -[woman] Don't lose anymore, all right? -[school bell rings]
translation.ja: もうなくしちゃダメよ

translation.en: Those things are expensive. Last pair. All right.
translation.ja: 高いんだから じゃあね

translation.en: Excuse me.
translation.ja: ちょっとあなた

translation.en: -You waiting for somebody? -Yeah, my brother.
translation.ja: 誰か来るの？ ええ 弟が

translation.en: He's supposed to be here.
translation.ja: 来るはず

translation.en: What grade is he in?
translation.ja: 何年生なの？

translation.en: Sixth.
translation.ja: ６年

translation.en: No, sixth graders, they left already, so that means he left too.
translation.ja: だったら もういないわ６年生は帰った

translation.en: -Is there somebody you want to call? -Yeah, I just did. My mom.
translation.ja: 誰かに電話する？ さっき母に

translation.en: Maybe your brother walked home?
translation.ja: 歩いて帰ったのかも

translation.en: He didn't.
translation.ja: いえ

translation.en: He takes his bike to school.
translation.ja: 自転車で通ってるの

translation.en: [woman] What your brother would be doing down here is beyond me.
translation.ja: あなたの弟こんな所で何を？

translation.en: He's not here. He's at the park.
translation.ja: ここじゃない 公園よ

translation.en: [woman] Do you see him?
translation.ja: いる？

translation.en: Where else do you think he could be?
translation.ja: 他に心当たりは？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.ja: わかんない

translation.en: Ryan!
translation.ja: ライアン！

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.ja: 何やってんのよ！

translation.en: Little shit.
translation.ja: 最低

translation.en: -[door shuts] -Fuck off.
translation.ja: うるさい

translation.en: [Ryan] I, uh...
translation.ja: これ

translation.en: kind of sat on this. Sorry.
translation.ja: つぶしちゃったよ ごめん

translation.en: It's okay.
translation.ja: いいのよ

translation.en: What is that?
translation.ja: それ何？

translation.en: [woman] It's a seagull.
translation.ja: かもめ

translation.en: My son Brenton made it.
translation.ja: 息子が作ったの

translation.en: [girl] Wow. It's cool.
translation.ja: かっこいい

translation.en: Put on your seat belts. If we hurry up, we can get you home
translation.ja: シートベルトを 急がないとご両親が心配するわ

translation.en: before it really starts kicking up.
translation.ja: 急がないとご両親が心配するわ

translation.en: [bartender] Ready for another?
translation.ja: もう一杯飲みますか？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: -I got tied up on the turnpike. So sorry. -[clerk] All rise.
translation.ja: 料金所が混んでて 起立

translation.en: Superior court of Hudson County, state of New Jersey, is now in session,
translation.ja: ハドソン郡 上位裁判所をただ今より開廷します

translation.en: Honorable Richard Blatt presiding.
translation.ja: 担当はブラット裁判官です

translation.en: Please sit.
translation.ja: 着席を

translation.en: Your Honor, the State presents complaint number...
translation.ja: 裁判官 州が定めた事件番号は…

translation.en: Uh, it's... Got it. Uh, it's...
translation.ja: お待ちください

translation.en: complaint number 5977.
translation.ja: 事件番号は5977

translation.en: This is the defendant's third shoplifting charge.
translation.ja: 被告は３回目の万引きで訴えられています

translation.en: Ms. Lufts stole $200 in cat food.
translation.ja: 200ドル相当のキャットフードを盗みました

translation.en: You've got the wrong defendant.
translation.ja: 間違ってる

translation.en: That's not the complaint number I'm looking at, Counselor.
translation.ja: その番号は間違っていますよ

translation.en: Get your paperwork in order before you walk into my courtroom.
translation.ja: きちんと準備をして法廷に来てください

translation.en: -Your Honor, I have it right here. It-- -[judge] Next.
translation.ja: 今 書類を… 次

translation.en: [man] Our county is the gold standard in law enforcement.
translation.ja: 我がハドソン郡は法を執行する際に―

translation.en: Working hand in hand with its citizens.
translation.ja: 市民と協力しあう模範的な自治体です

translation.en: The police violence we're witnessing in black and brown communities throughout America
translation.ja: 一定の人種に対する警察の暴力行為は―

translation.en: has no place in New Jersey.
translation.ja: この州にはありません

translation.en: As prosecutor, good police and community relations have been a priority in my administration.
translation.ja: 警察と地域の良好な関係が第一優先です

translation.en: [reporter] Mr. Connelly, when are you announcing your run for governor?
translation.ja: いつ 州知事に立候補されるんですか

translation.en: [man] Darius!
translation.ja: ダリウス

translation.en: Darius!
translation.ja: ダリウス！

translation.en: [woman] He was a little off-beat though.
translation.ja: 彼 リズムがずれてた

translation.en: -Gotta tell you. -[man] No.
translation.ja: それは違う

translation.en: I saw Brother Jerrel and you saw Brother Jerrel too.
translation.ja: 私と君はジェレル修道士を見てた

translation.en: And who he was looking at.
translation.ja: 彼は誰を？

translation.en: -[man chuckling] -Oh, you are crazy!
translation.ja: おかしなこと言わないで

translation.en: 'Saiah, you know that woman is married.
translation.ja: あの女性は結婚してるの

translation.en: I know, I'm just saying she looked good after she lost all that weight.
translation.ja: 痩せて綺麗になったって言ってるだけだ

translation.en: Brenton? Baby, you home?
translation.ja: ブレントン 帰ってるの？

translation.en: Brenton! Your mama's calling you, boy!
translation.ja: 返事しなさい

translation.en: He should be here by now. Or did he forget about tonight too?
translation.ja: 今夜のこと忘れてないだろうな

translation.en: No, Uncle Seth's coming home, and that's all he could talk about.
translation.ja: セスおじさんが来るってとても楽しみにしてたから

translation.en: He is so excited. He's got a surprise for the both of you.
translation.ja: セスおじさんが来るってとても楽しみにしてたから サプライズがあるって

translation.en: What? That he forgot his uncle's homecoming?
translation.ja: これがそれか？

translation.en: Aw, come on, he's either in the yard or upstairs in his room. I'll check.
translation.ja: 庭か自分の部屋にいるはず見てくるわ

translation.en: I see he's been messing with my TV again.
translation.ja: またテレビの設定が

translation.en: I can't turn it on if he's done playing with his damn video games.
translation.ja: アイツが使った後は電源も入れられない

translation.en: Well, maybe you should leave it off seeing as you got a whole house to paint.
translation.ja: 代わりに壁のペンキを塗りして

translation.en: [automated voice] You have one new message.
translation.ja: 新しいメッセージが１件あります

translation.en: Brenton!
translation.ja: ブレントン！

translation.en: [man] Yeah, we're looking for the parents of Brenton Butler.
translation.ja: ブレントンくんのご両親にお話が

translation.en: Could you call the South District police station when you get the message?
translation.ja: 南地区警察署にご連絡ください

translation.en: It concerns your son.
translation.ja: 息子さんのことです

translation.en: I heard the callout.
translation.ja: 無線を聞いた

translation.en: [officer] Found him with a BMX bike that's pretty banged up.
translation.ja: 自転車はめちゃくちゃでした

translation.en: [detective] Got any ID on the kid?
translation.ja: 子供の身元は？

translation.en: Brenton Butler. Black male, 15 years old.
translation.ja: ブレントン･バトラー 黒人男子 15歳です

translation.en: Notified the parents. He's at the ER at Jersey City Medical Center in surgery.
translation.ja: 両親には知らせましたジャージー病院で手術中です

translation.en: [detective] Anyone have a conversation with the parents?
translation.ja: 両親と話をしたか？

translation.en: [officer] Wanted to wait for you.
translation.ja: いえ まだです

translation.en: -He's alive? -[officer 2] Yeah.
translation.ja: 生きてる？

translation.en: He's probably fucking brain dead. It's like the Red Sea down there.
translation.ja: ああ　でも脳死だろう血の海だった

translation.en: -Hey. I'm sorry, brother. Um... -You gotta wait.
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's my son. He's been in a car accident.
translation.ja: 息子が交通事故に遭って

translation.en: You got to wait in line.
translation.ja: 並んでお待ちを

translation.en: We're sorry, we don't know what's going on with our son. Please?
translation.ja: 息子の容体がわからないの 本当にすみません

translation.en: -Thank you, thank you, thank you. -His name is Brenton. Brenton Butler.
translation.ja: 本当にすみません 息子はブレントン･バトラーです

translation.en: [receptionist] There's no "r." It's "Benton."
translation.ja: 綴りが違うわ

translation.en: Gave me the wrong spelling. I'll need you to fill this out.
translation.ja: 間違ったのね 書類に記入を保険証をお持ちですか

translation.en: -Do you have your insurance card, ID? -[woman] Yeah.
translation.ja: 書類に記入を保険証をお持ちですか はい

translation.en: Have a seat, the doctor will talk to you when he's done in surgery.
translation.ja: 手術後に担当医が話を

translation.en: Surgery?
translation.ja: 手術？

translation.en: Just have a seat. The doctor will talk to you when he's done.
translation.ja: 掛けてお待ちください

translation.en: -Why would he be in surgery? -I don't know.
translation.ja: なぜ手術を？ 私には分かりません

translation.en: They don't tell us these things.
translation.ja: 私には分かりません

translation.en: Please, just have a seat.
translation.ja: とにかくお待ちを

translation.en: Father God, praise be to you.
translation.ja: 神様 あなたの―

translation.en: Your glory, your mercy.
translation.ja: 栄光と 慈しみを

translation.en: Watch over our baby.
translation.ja: 息子をお守りください

translation.en: Please don't let my baby die, Father God. I don't know...
translation.ja: どうか助けてください

translation.en: I ask this in your holy name.
translation.ja: 聖なる神よ

translation.en: Please, Father God. Look after my...
translation.ja: 息子をお守りください

translation.en: Fuck. [breath trembling]
translation.ja: ああ やだ

translation.en: You're fine, you're fine, you're fine.
translation.ja: 平気　なんともない

translation.en: I'd been sleeping in my car under the Pulaski the whole day.
translation.ja: 車の中で寝てたんだよ 高速道路の下で　一日中ね

translation.en: Nobody bothers me there, except when that cop came banging on my window.
translation.ja: 警察が窓を叩くまで誰にも邪魔されなかった

translation.en: Did you drive through the park this morning?
translation.ja: 今朝 公園内で運転を？

translation.en: No, I-- I told you I was sleeping under the Pulaski all day.
translation.ja: してない　言っただろ １日中ずっと高速道路の下で寝てたんだ

translation.en: [man] Drinking too, right?
translation.ja: それに飲んでた

translation.en: -All the live long day. -[knocking, door opens]
translation.ja: １日中

translation.en: You the on-call AP?
translation.ja: あんたが担当の検事補？

translation.en: Yeah, I'm KJ Harper. They just put me back on an hour ago.
translation.ja: ええケイジェイ・ハーパーです １時間前に呼ばれたの

translation.en: Right. One of my CIs tipped us off to this guy.
translation.ja: あの男だってたれ込みがあった

translation.en: Saw Gramps here cleaning blood off the front of his car
translation.ja: 車についた血を拭いてるのを見たって

translation.en: near the park this morning. We just picked him up riding around near there,
translation.ja: それで引っ張ってきた

translation.en: two sheets to the wind.
translation.ja: べろんべろんだよ

translation.en: Why's narcotics interested in a hit-and-run?
translation.ja: 麻薬捜査班がどうしてひき逃げを？

translation.en: We just got a tip.
translation.ja: たれ込みがあったから

translation.en: -Hmm. -And he looks good for it.
translation.ja: いかにもやりそうだ

translation.en: Two prior DUIs, it's a matter of time before he killed someone.
translation.ja: 前科二犯の酔っ払いが車に乗りゃ人も殺すわな

translation.en: That's in the report. You read that, right?
translation.ja: 報告書を読んだだろ？

translation.en: Of course I did.
translation.ja: もちろん

translation.en: I just didn't realize reports were read by every Joe in the district.
translation.ja: 担当じゃない人が読んでるなんて驚いた

translation.en: [chuckles] Every...
translation.ja: 担当？

translation.en: Mike DiAngelo.
translation.ja: ディアンジェロだ

translation.en: KJ.
translation.ja: ケイジェイ

translation.en: I've seen you before, down at the courthouse.
translation.ja: 前に裁判所で見かけた

translation.en: You work the shoplifting cases.
translation.ja: 万引き担当だろ

translation.en: You got this tied up with a bow.
translation.ja: 簡単な事件だ

translation.en: You got enough for a plea without lifting one bejeweled nail.
translation.ja: 証拠は揃ってる楽勝だろう

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzing] -I know how to do my job, but thanks.
translation.ja: 私のやり方があるから

translation.en: Well, then do it.
translation.ja: じゃあやれよ

translation.en: Mr. Dorsey seems to believe he was asleep in his car.
translation.ja: ドーシーさんはずっと車で寝てたと主張してる

translation.en: Well, what's he gonna say?
translation.ja: それがどうした？

translation.en: "Oh, I just rolled over some kid's head in my Buick, my bad"?
translation.ja: “子供を轢いちまった”なんて言うか？

translation.en: [DiAngelo laughing] Come on.
translation.ja: しっかりしろよ

translation.en: Okay. Thanks.
translation.ja: 分かった ありがとう

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: おい

translation.en: The trash can's down there.
translation.ja: ゴミ箱はそこよ

translation.en: This fucking guy. It's your boy, Jablonski.
translation.ja: ほら電話だ かわいいヤブロンスキー

translation.en: He keeps calling.
translation.ja: 何度もかけてきてる

translation.en: [detective] Yo! Ms. Harper!
translation.ja: ハーパーさん

translation.en: Yo! Hey!
translation.ja: なあ おい

translation.en: Are you the assistant prosecutor on my job?
translation.ja: 俺と組む検事補だろ？

translation.en: I'm Joe Rinaldi. You can call me Fish.
translation.ja: 俺はジョー･リナルディ “フィッシュ”と

translation.en: Uh, former NYPD,
translation.ja: ニューヨーク市警から異動してきた

translation.en: but I just got this new place out on the water. It's fucking beautiful.
translation.ja: ニューヨーク市警から異動してきた いいとこだよな

translation.en: The kids love it, so I figured, fuck it, why not Jersey.
translation.ja: 子供が気に入ったから決断した

translation.en: -Did you need something from me? -Uh, yeah.
translation.ja: なにか用？

translation.en: Yeah. The guys in there said that you're ready to file this job.
translation.ja: ああ さっきいた連中が もう提訴するって言ってたから

translation.en: -You got enough for that? -Yep.
translation.ja: そうなのか？ ええ

translation.en: Yep. Okey-dokey. Um...
translation.ja: そうか 分かった

translation.en: Yo, are you going to the hospital? I need to pick up the victim's belongings.
translation.ja: 病院に行くか？ ガイシャの持ち物を…

translation.en: -Yeah. Yeah, I am. -Mind if I ride with?
translation.ja: そうね 乗せてくれる？

translation.en: Sure. Yeah.
translation.ja: もちろん

translation.en: If we pass a bodega en route, think about picking up some mints.
translation.ja: 途中でミントを買ったほうがいい

translation.en: I'm just-- I don't care. I'm just saying, out of respect for the family.
translation.ja: 俺は別に気にしないガイシャの家族のためだ

translation.en: I can smell you like a mile away. Not a good look.
translation.ja: かなり臭うよ 印象が悪い

translation.en: Actually, I have to go to the office for some paperwork, so...
translation.ja: やっぱり 先に事務所に行く だから

translation.en: Get your own ride there.
translation.ja: 自分で行って

translation.en: What'd they do to my boy?
translation.ja: 分からないんだ

translation.en: What'd they do to my boy?
translation.ja: 何があったのか

translation.en: -[man] Be with you every step of the way. -[Seth] It's all good, bro.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ しっかりしろ

translation.en: It's all right.
translation.ja: がんばって

translation.en: Oh, Latrice.
translation.ja: ラトリス

translation.en: [Seth] It's gonna be all right. It's gonna be all right.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だって きっとうまくいく

translation.en: Brenton, he was counting the days to see you in uniform.
translation.ja: あの子は 軍服のあなたと会うのを楽しみにしてた

translation.en: It's been a while. He's so proud.
translation.ja: 久しぶりだから あなたを誇らしく思ってた現地の話を聞きたがってたわ

translation.en: And he wants to hear all the stories about Afghanistan and Kandastan.
translation.ja: あなたを誇らしく思ってた現地の話を聞きたがってたわ

translation.en: Are you the parents of Brenton Butler?
translation.ja: ブレントンくんのご両親？

translation.en: -Uh, yeah. -He's stable. I was able to relieve the pressure on his brain,
translation.ja: 容態は安定しています脳圧は下がりましたが―

translation.en: but there's been significant impact, primarily to the posterior cortex, the back of his head.
translation.ja: 後部皮質への損傷がかなり激しいです

translation.en: What does that mean?
translation.ja: 意味は？

translation.en: He could lose the ability to function independently.
translation.ja: 自発的な機能を失う可能性が

translation.en: He could be on a ventilator for a long time.
translation.ja: 人工呼吸器が必要になります

translation.en: What happened? Was he at school?
translation.ja: 一体何が？ 学校にいたんですか？

translation.en: -The police haven't told us. -[doctor] I don't know. I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 警察は何も 私も分かりません

translation.en: Uh, can we see him now?
translation.ja: 会えますか？

translation.en: Not everyone right now, just the parents.
translation.ja: ご両親だけでしたらいいですよ

translation.en: -You can come with me. -Okay.
translation.ja: こちらへ はい

translation.en: -Where's DiAngelo at? -Come here.
translation.ja: ディアンジェロは？ こっちだ

translation.en: Not picking up his phone. No one's picking up.
translation.ja: 電話に出ないんだ 誰も出ない

translation.en: [Pete] Now what the fuck is going on?
translation.ja: どうなってる？

translation.en: DiAngelo would fucking lose his mind if he saw you here.
translation.ja: 来たのを知ったらディアンジェロがキレるぞ

translation.en: We're taking care of it.
translation.ja: 俺たちに任せろ

translation.en: The kid's alive. Now that's what you call taking care of it? Huh?
translation.ja: ガキは生きてるどうするつもりだ

translation.en: You think we fucking knew that?
translation.ja: 誰も知らなかった

translation.en: Look, all I'm saying is there's got to be another way.
translation.ja: 他にやり方があるはずだ

translation.en: This is wrong, and you know it is.
translation.ja: 間違ってる 分かってんだろ

translation.en: This whole thing's gonna blow up.
translation.ja: おしまいだ

translation.en: And we're all gonna go to prison for a fucking accident.
translation.ja: 俺たち全員 ムショ行きになる

translation.en: A white cop and a black kid?
translation.ja: 白人警官と黒人の子供だぞ？

translation.en: Don't you watch the news?
translation.ja: ニュースを見ろ

translation.en: There are no fucking accidents anymore, and you know it.
translation.ja: そんな事故はなかった 分かってんだろ

translation.en: The assistant prosecutor's filing papers on a guy tonight. It's over.
translation.ja: 検察補が 今夜書類を提出して終わりだ

translation.en: What guy?
translation.ja: 誰の？

translation.en: Who cares, man? Not you.
translation.ja: そんなの知るか お前じゃない

translation.en: Excuse me, I just started the Narcotics Unit here.
translation.ja: すみません 麻薬捜査班に配属になった者です

translation.en: DiAngelo's team?
translation.ja: ディアンジェロの

translation.en: You know who's um... who's working the hit-and-run in the park?
translation.ja: 公園のひき逃げ事件の担当者は？

translation.en: Another new guy, Rinaldi. He's out, left an hour ago.
translation.ja: 新しく来たリナルディよ 外出した

translation.en: -[Pete] Know when he's gonna be back? -I have no idea.
translation.ja: 戻りはいつ？ 分からない

translation.en: Do you want to leave a message?
translation.ja: 伝言残す？

translation.en: What about the captain? You got his name?
translation.ja: では警部の名前を

translation.en: You got a report, you can turn it in to your supervising officer.
translation.ja: 報告なら上司にして

translation.en: I gotta talk to the captain. Direct.
translation.ja: 警部と直接話したい

translation.en: I'll leave my cell, all right?
translation.ja: じゃあ 俺の電話番号を

translation.en: Just make sure he gets it.
translation.ja: 必ず渡して

translation.en: Yep.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: Got the kid's clothing. How about you?
translation.ja: ガイシャの服だ

translation.en: Get all your personal business taken care of?
translation.ja: あんたは？用事は終わった？

translation.en: Pick up some milk? Go to the bank?
translation.ja: 牛乳を買うとか

translation.en: That's good. That's important.
translation.ja: 銀行に行くとか大事だろ

translation.en: [Fish] Mr. Butler? Mrs. Butler?
translation.ja: バトラーさんは？

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.ja: あんた誰だ？

translation.en: We're with the prosecutor's office. We're looking for the parents.
translation.ja: 検察庁から来た両親と話をしたい

translation.en: Yes.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: I'm Detective Rinaldi. This is KJ Harper.
translation.ja: 刑事のリナルディですこちらはケイジェイ

translation.en: [Isaiah] What happened to my son?
translation.ja: 息子に何が？

translation.en: -They said he was in a car accident. -[Latrice] Yeah.
translation.ja: 交通事故に遭ったと言われたが

translation.en: No one's talked to us. The police haven't said anything.
translation.ja: それ以上は何も教えてもらえなくて

translation.en: [Fish] Uh, we need some privacy right now to talk. Please.
translation.ja: ご両親とだけお話ししたいのですが

translation.en: Joseph, can you give us a minute? There's a waiting room at the end of the hall.
translation.ja: ジョセフたちは待合室で待ってて

translation.en: There'll be a bail hearing tomorrow before the arraignment at the courthouse.
translation.ja: 明日の朝郡庁舎で保釈査問会が…

translation.en: [Seth] That's not what they asked. We need to know exactly how this happened.
translation.ja: そんなことより何があった？

translation.en: Your son was in a hit-and-run this morning at Liberty State Park.
translation.ja: 今朝 ひき逃げに遭いました

translation.en: [Isaiah] This morning?
translation.ja: 今朝？

translation.en: They didn't call us until a few hours ago.
translation.ja: 連絡は数時間前だ

translation.en: That's when they found him, earlier tonight. Two people found him. Their dog, actually.
translation.ja: その頃に 男性二人が…犬が見つけたんです

translation.en: [KJ] We have the man in custody who we believe did this.
translation.ja: 被疑者の男を拘留してますので

translation.en: I'll be filing paperwork with the judge tonight
translation.ja: 今晩中に書類を裁判官に提出し―

translation.en: for his hearing first thing tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明朝 査問会を

translation.en: Can you be a little more clear with the details? I...
translation.ja: 分かるように説明を

translation.en: [KJ] Oh... Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: [Fish] It's a nice bike your son's got.
translation.ja: 息子さんの自転車は―

translation.en: Five Kings rides them too. That series of BMX goes for some serious bank.
translation.ja: ファイブキングスと同じのでかなり高価だ

translation.en: What are you implying?
translation.ja: どういう意味だ？

translation.en: That Brenton's with a gang? Really? You gonna do this now?
translation.ja: ブレントンはギャングだと？

translation.en: Wanna step back, whoever you are, and let me talk to the family?
translation.ja: 邪魔しないでくれ家族と話してる

translation.en: I am family, and I don't appreciate you coming up in here
translation.ja: 家族だ 押しかけてきて甥を責めるのは…

translation.en: -and accusing my nephew-- -[Isaiah] Seth, let me handle this.
translation.ja: 押しかけてきて甥を責めるのは… セス 私に任せろ

translation.en: We bought the bike.
translation.ja: 私たちが買ってあげたの

translation.en: Brenton's 16th birthday's coming up soon.
translation.ja: もうすぐ16歳の誕生日だから

translation.en: Now, what's gonna happen to the man who did this?
translation.ja: それで その男はどうなる？

translation.en: Well, I'll be charging Mr. Dorsey with leaving the scene of a motor vehicle accident
translation.ja: 事故後の人命救助を怠り重傷を負わせたとして―

translation.en: resulting in serious bodily injury.
translation.ja: ドーシーさんを告訴します

translation.en: And I'll suggest the maximum sentence for this type of felony.
translation.ja: 最も重い刑を求刑するつもりです

translation.en: Which is what, exactly?
translation.ja: どのくらいだ？

translation.en: Three to five years.
translation.ja: ３年から５年です

translation.en: My son laid in the cold...
translation.ja: 息子は… 放っておかれたの

translation.en: in the snow, in pain...
translation.ja: 雪の中で ケガを負ったまま

translation.en: for hours.
translation.ja: 何時間も

translation.en: And no one came for him except a dog.
translation.ja: 誰も現れず ようやく犬に見つけてもらった

translation.en: He may never walk again.
translation.ja: もう歩けないかもしれない

translation.en: He may never wake up again.
translation.ja: 二度と目を覚まさないかも

translation.en: And you're telling me that the person that did this
translation.ja: それなのに― たった３年から５年の罪だっていうの？

translation.en: will get three to five years?
translation.ja: たった３年から５年の罪だっていうの？

translation.en: That man deserves to die for what he did to my son!
translation.ja: 死刑に値するはずだわ！

translation.en: Latrice.
translation.ja: ラトリス

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 残念です

translation.en: [Fish] My card.
translation.ja: 連絡先です

translation.en: -[KJ sighs] Damn it. -[alarm chirps]
translation.ja: ああ もう

translation.en: You're locking yourself out doing it like that. Just click it once.
translation.ja: 押すのは１度だけでいいんだ

translation.en: I don't need to be told how to unlock my damn car.
translation.ja: 自分の車よそんなの分かってる

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: What? Come on. Harper!
translation.ja: 何だ？　頼むよ

translation.en: -[Fish] Come on! -[knocking]
translation.ja: 開けてくれ

translation.en: -[starts engine] -But we gotta go to impound.
translation.ja: 押収品を見に行くんだろ

translation.en: We gotta get the paperwork on Dorsey's car.
translation.ja: 書類も作るんだし

translation.en: -[Fish] Harper, please. -[knocking]
translation.ja: ハーパー頼む

translation.en: Harper, look. Look.
translation.ja: ハーパー 見ろ

translation.en: This is you when the night's done and you don't have to see me anymore.
translation.ja: 朝のあんたの顔だ 俺ともおさらば

translation.en: [Fish] Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: [pastor] Today we claim promises over our son Brenton.
translation.ja: 皆の息子ブレントンを お守りください

translation.en: We believe in the healing power of faith and prayer
translation.ja: 祈りの力を信じます

translation.en: and ask you to begin your mighty work in the life of Brenton.
translation.ja: ブレントンをお守り下さい

translation.en: Lord, your word speaks promises of healing and restoration.
translation.ja: 主よ ブレントンは蘇ると預言をお与えください

translation.en: And we thank you for the miracles you still perform today.
translation.ja: 主が起こす奇跡に感謝いたします

translation.en: Is he gonna live?
translation.ja: 助かりますか

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: え？

translation.en: [Pete] I'm sorry. I was in the wrong room.
translation.ja: すみません部屋を間違えました

translation.en: I'm gonna turn myself in.
translation.ja: 自首する

translation.en: But nobody's gotta know none of you were there.
translation.ja: あんたたちは関係ない

translation.en: Just to be clear...
translation.ja: 忠告しておく

translation.en: this is what's gonna happen.
translation.ja: 何が起こるか

translation.en: Well, they are gonna fuck you...
translation.ja: 弾劾されるぞ

translation.en: for Ferguson...
translation.ja: ファガーソンや

translation.en: Chicago, Baltimore...
translation.ja: シカゴやバルチモアで―

translation.en: for every white cop who ever killed a black kid.
translation.ja: 黒人の子供を殺した白人のデカと同じように

translation.en: -It was an accident. -No one gives a shit.
translation.ja: 事故だった 誰も信じねえよ

translation.en: So, before you do anything,
translation.ja: よく考えろ

translation.en: I want you to think about what kind of father you'd be behind bars...
translation.ja: ムショにいる父親がどんなものか

translation.en: out of your son's life.
translation.ja: 息子と離れて暮らし

translation.en: He ain't ever gonna know you.
translation.ja: 息子は父親に会えない

translation.en: You're a good cop, I see it. That's why I picked you.
translation.ja: お前はいいデカだ だから拾ってやった

translation.en: You and me? We're a dying breed.
translation.ja: 俺たちは同じ船に乗ったんだよ

translation.en: And we take care of our own, you understand?
translation.ja: 死ぬまで運命を共にする いいな

translation.en: [DiAngelo] Don't go behind my back again.
translation.ja: 二度と勝手なマネするな

translation.en: -[sighs] -[man speaks indistinctly]
translation.ja: 規則です

translation.en: [Fish] I need the paperwork on my hit-and-run. It's Mac Dorsey's car.
translation.ja: マック･ドーシーの車を見せてくれ

translation.en: Who's the owner of the car? We need a signature.
translation.ja: 持ち主は？署名が必要です

translation.en: [Fish] I told you, Mac Dorsey.
translation.ja: 言っただろマック･ドーシーだ

translation.en: [Fish] Hey!
translation.ja: おーい

translation.en: They need your John Hancock!
translation.ja: あんたの署名がいるって

translation.en: You want to wait inside?
translation.ja: 中へどうぞ

translation.en: It'll take about half an hour to release the paperwork on the vehicle.
translation.ja: 書類を作るのに30分くらいかかるので

translation.en: [KJ] I'll wait in the car.
translation.ja: 車で待ってます

translation.en: Why? It's just a sign off.
translation.ja: なんで？ 署名しただろ

translation.en: [man] My supervisor's on break.
translation.ja: 上司が休憩中で

translation.en: It's two in the fucking morning, what's he doing?
translation.ja: 夜中の２時に何を？

translation.en: [man] It's out of my hands. You can wait inside--
translation.ja: 分かりません　中でお待ちを

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzes] -Rather freeze my balls off. Thanks.
translation.ja: 凍えた方がマシだ

translation.en: [Fish] Hey.
translation.ja: もしもし

translation.en: Well, you gotta use the tape on the diaper, I told you that.
translation.ja: おむつにテープを使えって言っただろ

translation.en: Or he's gonna be dropping shit bombs all over the place.
translation.ja: 家中にクソするぞ

translation.en: Well, use your head.
translation.ja: 少しは考えろ

translation.en: How's Lizzie doing? Give her the hamburger yet?
translation.ja: リジーは？ ハンバーガーを夕飯に

translation.en: [Fish] You gonna hit that?
translation.ja: 飲むのか？

translation.en: Because there's a cream.
translation.ja: 薬があったぞ

translation.en: [KJ] What?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: I'm telling you, hobo herpes, it's a thing. I swear to God.
translation.ja: ヘルペスだよ　間違いない ヤバイぜ

translation.en: Did you see Dorsey's face?
translation.ja: 奴の顔を見たろ？

translation.en: That pastor of yours found a chapel downstairs.
translation.ja: 下にチャペルあるって

translation.en: Wants you to head down for some holy rolling with Jesus.
translation.ja: 牧師が 聖歌を歌おうってさ

translation.en: Seth. Enough.
translation.ja: セス やめろ

translation.en: Why'd you tell the police we bought Brenton that bike?
translation.ja: なぜ “自転車を買った”と？

translation.en: You saw his face.
translation.ja: 刑事の顔を見たでしょ

translation.en: He already had his mind made up that he was in a gang.
translation.ja: ブレントンをギャングだって決めつけてた

translation.en: Because of what? The bike?
translation.ja: 自転車のせいよ

translation.en: Where'd he get it from?
translation.ja: どこで自転車を？

translation.en: What was he doing in that park?
translation.ja: 公園で何をしてた？

translation.en: I won't tolerate you covering up for him anymore.
translation.ja: あの子かばうのはもうやめてくれ

translation.en: I know he'd been going back to the projects, and that park, after I explicitly told him not to go.
translation.ja: 行くなと言ったのに公営住宅や公園も行ってた

translation.en: 'Saiah, he misses his friends.
translation.ja: 友達に会いたかったのよ

translation.en: He misses his home.
translation.ja: 家も恋しくて

translation.en: That's not his home.
translation.ja: あそこは家じゃない

translation.en: Not anymore.
translation.ja: もう違うんだ

translation.en: I don't know where he got it.
translation.ja: 私は何も知らない

translation.en: [Seth] You ought to go with him.
translation.ja: 兄さんと―

translation.en: Go on, Tricey. I'll stay here with B.
translation.ja: 家に帰って ブレントンは俺が

translation.en: He's gonna suffocate Brenton with all of his worries.
translation.ja: あんなに心配されたらあの子の息が詰まる

translation.en: Just like he did you.
translation.ja: あなたもよね

translation.en: Kid must've been conscious for a while.
translation.ja: しばらく意識があったはずだ

translation.en: He's stuck between these two snowbanks here.
translation.ja: ２つの雪だまりの間にはさまって

translation.en: Crawling around,
translation.ja: 這いずり回り

translation.en: trying to find a way out, probably screaming for his mama.
translation.ja: もがきながら母親の名前を叫んでた

translation.en: Crime scene photos give you the heebie-jeebies?
translation.ja: 写真は見たくないか？

translation.en: I don't need to look at them.
translation.ja: 見る必要がない

translation.en: Isn't that, like, your job? [clears throat]
translation.ja: あんたの仕事だろ？

translation.en: Nope. My job is to file paperwork.
translation.ja: 違う 私の仕事は書類を作ること

translation.en: File paperwork? You could file paperwork at any fuck-face firm down on the water.
translation.ja: それなら― 事務所でやればいいだろ

translation.en: I'm sick of their eyes.
translation.ja: 目がイヤなの

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: Even when they're dead, it's...
translation.ja: 死ぬっていう時にも

translation.en: They're looking at you, wanting answers.
translation.ja: 答えを欲しがって見つめてくる

translation.en: You worked Homicide before?
translation.ja: 殺人事件は初めて？

translation.en: How'd you get bumped to car crimes?
translation.ja: 車両犯罪は？

translation.en: Car crimes. Heh... right.
translation.ja: 車両犯罪？ そうね

translation.en: Paralyzing a kid gets you three to five years,
translation.ja: 体を麻痺させても３年から５年

translation.en: but it's guaranteed you won't do most of that time.
translation.ja: 実際はもっと短い

translation.en: It's the greatest show on Earth, this shit.
translation.ja: なんてステキ

translation.en: Did you see the driver's seat in Dorsey's car?
translation.ja: ドーシーの車の運転席を見た？

translation.en: That narc cop said he had to chase him down,
translation.ja: あの刑事は車で逃げるドーシーを―

translation.en: driving around outside the park, right? That's how they caught him.
translation.ja: 追いかけて捕まえたと

translation.en: So?
translation.ja: それで？

translation.en: So, how do you drive lying down?
translation.ja: シートを倒したまま運転できる？

translation.en: Here comes asshat. Finally.
translation.ja: バカがやっと来た

translation.en: -[man] Have a good night. -Whatever. Go fuck yourself.
translation.ja: どうぞ 遅いんだよ

translation.en: Ah, okay.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: I'm gonna write up the kid's belongings in the morning. [sniffs]
translation.ja: 明日の朝 ガイシャの持ち物を記録する

translation.en: -Okay. -You know, I can get an Uber from here.
translation.ja: 分かった 車を拾って帰るけどあんたと組めてよかったよ

translation.en: But, yo, it was good working with you.
translation.ja: 車を拾って帰るけどあんたと組めてよかったよ

translation.en: Yeah. You too.
translation.ja: そうね 私も

translation.en: And um...
translation.ja: それから

translation.en: Listen, the dead don't need answers.
translation.ja: いいか 死人に答えはいらない

translation.en: They're dead. Okay?
translation.ja: 死んでるんだから そうだろ

translation.en: See you at trial in the morning. Don't forget about those mints, huh?
translation.ja: 明日 法廷で ミントを忘れんなよ

translation.en: Fuck!
translation.ja: もう！

translation.en: [nurse] Excuse me.
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: Are you family?
translation.ja: ご家族の方？

translation.en: I'm his attorney.
translation.ja: 代理人です

translation.en: [clerk] Complaint number 39012, the State versus Mac Henry Dorsey.
translation.ja: 事件番号39012 被告人マック･ドーシー

translation.en: The counselor's appearance for the record.
translation.ja: 弁護人も同席します

translation.en: [judge] Is the State gonna talk?
translation.ja: 原告どうぞ

translation.en: Judge, it's not my complaint number.
translation.ja: 私の担当ではありません

translation.en: Then where the hell is my prosecutor?
translation.ja: 担当の検察官は？

translation.en: [attorney] I'm sorry, Judge. I don't know.
translation.ja: 私も分かりません

translation.en: Next case.
translation.ja: 次の事件を

translation.en: [clerk] Complaint number 39013, the State versus Lonny Mendoza.
translation.ja: 事件番号39013 被告人 ロニー･メンドーサ
